regions.name: Moku'ah
regions.description: A lush and vibrant jungle region.

locations.name: Village Center
locations.description: The village center contains useful tutorial NPCs, and questgiver NPCs.

locations.name: Blacksmith
locations.description: Players can use the services of the blacksmith to craft items and equipment.

locations.name: Farm
locations.description: Players can use the farm to grow crops for use in crafting.

locations.name: Tavern
locations.description: Players can cook and brew here.

locations.name: Clinic
locations.description: Players respawn here if they die in this region.

locations.name: Dock
locations.description: Player can travel to other specified regions at the dock.

locations.name: Jungle
locations.description: Tier 1 dungeon for players to fight enemies and get loot in.

locations.name: Volcano
locations.description: Tier 3 dungeon for players to fight enemies and get loot in. Mixed subscriber content

regions.name: Nyra
regions.description: A coastal town with beautiful beaches.

locations.name: Town
locations.description: The village center contains useful tutorial NPCs.

locations.name: Crafthouse
locations.description: Players can use the services of the crafthouse to craft items and equipment.

locations.name: Tavern
locations.description: Contains questgiver NPCs.

locations.name: Beach
locations.description: The beautiful beach of Nyra.

locations.name: Labyrinth
locations.description: Tier 2 dungeon for players to fight enemies and get loot in.

locations.name: Hospital
locations.description: Players respawn here if they die in this region.

regions.name: Isfjall
regions.description: A frozen tundra with a bustling city center.

locations.name: City Center
locations.description: The center of the city.

locations.name: Blacksmith
locations.description: A place to forge weapons and armor.

locations.name: Dock
locations.description: The dock of Isfjall.

locations.name: Tundra
locations.description: A vast and frozen tundra.

locations.name: Hospital
locations.description: Players respawn here if they die in this region.

regions.name: The Trench
regions.description: A deep and mysterious underwater trench.

locations.name: Entrance
locations.description: The entrance to The Trench.

locations.name: The Shallows
locations.description: The shallow part of the trench.

locations.name: The Depths
locations.description: The deep part of the trench.

locations.name: Obsidian City
locations.description: A city made of obsidian.
